text:
Reorg Research | Software Engineer + QA Engineer - New York, NY | ONSITE | http://reorg-research.com/jobs

Growing financial/legal media organization looking for developers and QA engineers to expand our web application.

Dev - We have a great team of developers already in house. We are looking for someone who can join the team and start contributing to projects. Our tech stack is: PHP/Laravel MySQL, MongoDB, Elasticsearch Python, Node.js Backbone, Vue

QA - Manual/automation role. Automation uses Selenium web driver with the code written in Java.
